title: Unathi Nkayi announces release of memoir
text:
Unathi Nkayi announces release of memoir share this

Johannesburg – Singer and former radio presenter Unathi Nkayi has revealed that she will be releasing her memoir in November.

The Idols SA judge shared a photo of the book cover on Instagram, captioning it with the release date: "Out 6th November 2019".

According to the cover, the book was co-written by muso Kabomo.

Making the announcement on his own Instagram account, Kabomo wrote: "For the last couple of months I've had the pleasure of co-authoring my friend @unathi.co's memoir. It has been a beautiful ride. We are a few weeks away from it landing in your hands. I can't wait for you to read it."

Unathi joins the likes of Letshego Zulu and Rolene Strauss who have both released books in 2019.
